description.value:
This object, made of silver light, takes the form of a small musical instrument, prop, or other tool associated with a specific art form. The holder of the immaculate instrument never suffers from creative blocks of any kind and their work is always insightful and skilled. A character who uses the immaculate instrument to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Perform] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Craft] can attempt the check at mythic proficiency once per month, and as long as they possess their immaculate instrument, they treat any critical failures with these skills as failures.

Destruction If the holder uses the immaculate instrument to intentionally produce a work that is not just mediocre or crass, but one that devalues the public opinion of the art form itself in a showing of at least 100 spectators, the instrument fades away in shame.
